english.segment1: I can hear the deep, deep love of Jesus. Calling out my name, I'll never be the same (2x). I've been marked be heaven forever and ever(4x)
english.segment2: I'm walking in the glory now. And I never plan on coming down (2x)
english.segment3: I can feel the deep, deep blood of Jesus. Wash away my sin, so I can look like Him
english.segment4: I'm moving glory to glory, I'm never looking back (4x)
